headline: 2 Reasons AME is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: While the S&P 500 is up 29.3% since April 2025, AMETEK (currently trading at $185.47 per share) has lagged behind, posting a return of 19.5%. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
